cleaned_text: 1. MANAGE YOUR STRESS Don't let stress get the best of you — emotionally or physically. Take a [yoga class,](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/calendar-events-classes?category=yoga) try [acupuncture](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/services/graf-center-integrative-medicine), learn to [meditate](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/calendar-events-classes?category=meditation-stress-management). Our [Graf Center for Integrative Medicine](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/services/graf-center-integrative-medicine) offers all of these services in a clean, safe, and comfortable environment. 2. LEARN TIPS FOR EATING BETTER Eating better is about more than willpower. Learn ways to cook easy and "clean" meals for you and your family at one of our [cooking classes](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/calendar-events-classes?category=nutrition). Or learn to become a savvy grocery shopper with a [guided tour](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/calendar-events-classes?category=nutrition) of [Whole Foods Market](http://www.wholefoodsmarket.com), led by our nutritionists. 3. QUIT SMOKING We don't need to explain why. If you're finally ready to kick the habit for good, we've got a [ smoking cessation program](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/calendar-events-classes/pack-it-up-smoking-cessation-program-with-acupuncture-8-session-program-40715187221) that combines group sessions with acupuncture. It begins January 9 and space is limited, so register today. 4. LOSE EXCESS POUNDS Losing weight is about more than looking good. It's about your health. If you've struggled to lose weight, come to our [weekly info session](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/calendar-events-classes?category=bariatric-weight-loss) to meet our experts and see if [weight loss surgery](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/services/bariatric-surgery) is right for you. 5. GET CHECKED OUT Whether you need a routine visit with a [primary care doctor](https://www.englewoodhealthphysicians.org/find-a-doctor/), or want to have something checked out by a [specialist](https://www.englewoodhealthphysicians.org/find-a-doctor/), our [MDPartners physician network](https://www.englewoodhealthphysicians.org/) has nearly [75 office locations](https://www.englewoodhealthphysicians.org/our-practices/) throughout northern New Jersey. We also have an [executive wellness program](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/services/bravermanwellness), where you can spend a full day getting a head-to-toe assessment while pampering yourself in the process. 6. AWAKEN YOUR SENSES Lavender, vanilla, citrus, and sage — learn the power of [aromatherapy](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/services/graf-center-integrative-medicine) to support your well-being. Or spend an hour listening to chimes and gongs at our [sound therapy workshop](/calendar-events-classes/healing-power-of-sound-41561565762). Let the gentle touch of a [Reiki](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/services/graf-center-integrative-medicine) master relax your mind and restore your energy, or participate in an art therapy project. 7. EDUCATE YOURSELF Knowledge is power — our lectures and workshops cover topics from [cancer screening](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/services/cancer-treatment-and-wellness-center) to [joint replacement](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/services/joint-replacement-center), [CPR training](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/calendar-events-classes?category=ems-training) to the benefits of [acupuncture](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/services/graf-center-integrative-medicine). Get relevant and expert tips from our [doctors](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/find-a-doctor), so you can make 2018 a healthy and happy one for you and your family. Posted on December 26, 2018
